homePage.fromIdeaToBatchText:
We transform yarn into colors that will delight you for years to come. Every stage — from shade development to delivery — is carried out with meticulous attention to detail and strict quality
control.
homePage.hero: Dyed yarn — more than just color
homePage.heroText: We create not just threads, but the foundation for inspiring collections. Our shades combine aesthetics, durability, and sustainability — so your products stand out from the rest.
homePage.machine: With over 3+ years of experience, we guarantee consistent dyed yarn quality for textile manufacturers and industrial clients.
homePage.home1:
Each batch goes through a full journey from raw material to
a unique shade created for your order
homePage.subtitle: Unique shades — tailored to your request and style.

reviews.text: We have been working with RAINBOW-TEKS for over a year. The quality of the dyed yarn is always consistent, the shades fully meet our requirements, and deliveries are always on time. I highly recommend them as a reliable supplier!
reviews.name: Russia

reviews.text: We ordered cotton and viscose yarn for our sweater collection. The colors are vibrant, the threads are soft, and they work perfectly on our factory’s equipment. The service is excellent — the managers are always available and responsive.
reviews.name: Italy

reviews.text: RAINBOW-TEKS is a partner you can trust. Orders for acrylic and poly-cotton yarn always arrive quickly and without defects. We especially appreciate the company’s flexibility in selecting the right counts and shades.
reviews.name: Turkey

footer.title: Want to learn more about our yarn? Call us!
footer.label: Phone
footer.text: Contact us for a consultation, yarn selection, or to place an order. We’re always happy to help you choose the perfect color and quality!

about.text1: For over 3 years, RAINBOW-TEKS LLC has been successfully operating both in the domestic and international markets. We offer dyed yarn made from 100% cotton, viscose, acrylic, and poly-cotton of any count — combining consistent quality with a modern approach.
about.text3: 100% cotton: from Ne10/1 to Ne50/1 — single or multi-ply twist, tailored for any application.
about.text4: All products meet ISO 9001:2015 and OEKO-TEX® Standard 100 standards — ensuring safety and consistent quality.
about.text5: We manufacture premium-quality products in accordance with international standards.
about.text6: An individual approach to every client — adapting to your requirements and deadlines.
about.text7: Reliable supply, strict adherence to delivery schedules, and long-term partnerships.
about.text8: We match shades using Pantone, color charts, or your own samples — with maximum accuracy and speed.
about.text11: We specialize in dyeing yarn made from 100% natural cotton. Each thread retains its strength and softness, while the color preserves its richness and durability.

stepCards.title: Daily capacity
stepCards.text: The facility is capable of producing up to 10 tons of products per day.

stepCards.title: Annual output
stepCards.text: The total production capacity reaches 3,600 tons per year.

stepCards.title: Shade Development
stepCards.text: Creating new color samples takes no more than 3 working days.

reviewss.text: The color palette is truly impressive! It’s easy to find the right shades for our collections.

reviewss.name: David
reviewss.text: The company has proven itself as a reliable partner — precise deadlines, high-quality products, and open communication.

projectsss.title: Rewinding
projectsss.intro: The raw yarn undergoes quality inspection and is rewound onto cones, ensuring stability and readiness for dyeing.
projectsss.date: Inspection and rewinding of yarn onto cones
projectsss.about: The raw yarn undergoes strict quality control — checking for irregularities, knots, and fiber tensile strength. It is then fed into winding machines, where it is carefully rewound onto plastic cones. This is a preparatory stage that ensures even dyeing and high-quality finished products.
projectsss.results: Rewinding ensures stable yarn tension, an ideal base for dyeing, and reliability in subsequent production stages.

services.title: Quality Control
services.description: Inspection of yarn for defects and compliance with strength standards.

services.title: Rewinding onto Cones
services.description: Forming convenient yarn packages for a stable dyeing process.

services.title: Even Tension
services.description: Ensuring proper yarn structure and density.

services.title: Preparation for Dyeing
services.description: Creating the perfect foundation for subsequent technological stages.

projectsss.title: Dyeing
projectsss.intro: At the dyeing stage, the yarn is colored using the reactive dyeing method in the selected shade. Afterward, samples undergo laboratory tests to ensure color fastness, uniformity, and overall quality.
projectsss.date: Active Dyeing and Color Quality Control
projectsss.about: At the dyeing stage, the yarn acquires its final shade. We use reactive dyeing, which ensures rich, even, and long-lasting color. After dyeing, samples from each batch are taken for laboratory testing.
projectsss.results: The dyeing process guarantees brightness, durability, and compliance with international quality standards, making our yarn a reliable choice for fabric and knitwear production.

services.title: Color Uniformity Inspection
services.description: Control of color consistency on each yarn cone.

services.title:
Rubbing Fastness
(ISO 105-X12)
services.description: Testing color resistance to mechanical friction.

services.title:
Color Fastness
(ISO 105-C05)
services.description: Evaluating shade retention during washing and care.

services.title: Spirality (ISO 3071)
services.description: Measuring the stability of the shape and structure of the dyed yarn.

projectsss.title: Drying
projectsss.intro: After successfully passing quality control, the dyed yarn is sent for drying, where its strength, softness, and color uniformity are preserved.
projectsss.about: After successful testing, the dyed yarn proceeds to the drying stage. Modern equipment ensures even moisture removal while preserving fiber strength, softness, and color stability. Gentle drying guarantees that each yarn cone retains its properties and is ready for further processing.
projectsss.results: Drying helps fix the color, maintain the texture, and prepare the yarn for the next stage of production.

services.title: Even Drying
services.description: Moisture removal without compromising fiber quality or softness.

services.title: Color Preservation
services.description: Fixing the depth and durability of the dyed yarn’s color.

services.title: Moisture Control
services.description: Maintaining the optimal level of humidity for further processing.

services.title: Preparation for Next Stage
services.description: Creating the perfect base for winding onto cardboard cones.

projectsss.title: Rewinding on Cardboard Cones
projectsss.intro: After drying, the yarn is rewound onto cardboard cones and undergoes testing for strength, color fastness, and dye uniformity.
projectsss.date: Rewinding and Quality Control of Dyed Yarn
projectsss.about: After drying, the yarn is rewound onto cardboard cones — this is the final stage before packaging and shipment to the customer. At this stage, additional quality checks are carried out: samples are tested for rubbing fastness, color fastness, and dye uniformity. A special unwinding test is also performed to ensure there are no undyed areas throughout the entire cone.
projectsss.results: Rewinding onto cardboard cones ensures convenient further use, while quality control guarantees color consistency and compliance with international standards.

services.title:
Rub Resistance
(ISO 105-X12)
services.description: Testing color resistance to mechanical friction.

services.title:
Color Fastness
(ISO 105-C05)
services.description: Checking the durability of the shade during washing and care.

services.title: Dyeing Uniformity Inspection
services.description: Unwinding tests to detect any undyed areas.

services.title: Winding onto Cardboard Cones
services.description: Convenient cone formation for storage, transportation, and further use.

projectsss.title: Laboratory
projectsss.intro: In the laboratory, each batch of yarn undergoes detailed testing — including shade verification, rubbing fastness, and color fastness — ensuring consistent product quality.
projectsss.date: Testing of Dyed Yarn According to International Standards
projectsss.about: In the laboratory, each batch of dyed yarn undergoes detailed quality control. The shade, dye uniformity, rubbing fastness, and washing resistance are tested. International testing standards are applied to ensure consistent characteristics and high product quality.
projectsss.results: Laboratory testing confirms that the yarn meets customer requirements and international standards, ensuring the reliability of every batch.

services.title: Shade Verification
services.description: Control of color accuracy and uniformity.

services.title:
Rub Fastness
(ISO 105-X12)
services.description: Testing the durability of the dye under mechanical friction.

services.title:
Color Fastness
(ISO 105-C05)
services.description: Testing shade resistance during washing and care.

services.title: Standards Compliance
services.description: Certification of product quality according to international testing methods.

projectsss.title: Packaging
projectsss.intro: After the final quality control, each yarn cone is labeled, securely packed, and placed into cardboard boxes, ensuring reliable protection and easy product identification.
projectsss.date: Labeling and Packaging of Yarn into Individual and Transport Boxes
projectsss.about: After passing the final quality control, the yarn proceeds to the packaging stage. Each cone is labeled with the customer’s name, yarn count, color, color code, and batch number. The cones are then packed in cellophane bags and stacked into cardboard boxes. The boxes are also labeled with customer details, yarn count, batch number, color, as well as net and gross weight.
projectsss.results: Packaging ensures reliable protection of the yarn during storage and transportation, as well as convenient product identification throughout the entire supply chain.

services.title: Cone Labeling
services.description: Applying information about the customer, yarn count, batch number, and color.

services.title: Individual Packaging
services.description: Each cone is securely sealed in a cellophane bag.

services.title: Box Formation
services.description: Cones are carefully stacked and placed into cardboard boxes.

services.title: Box Labeling
services.description: Indicating customer details, batch number, color, and weight for accurate identification.

projectsss.title: Rewinding
projectsss.intro: Raw yarn undergoes quality control and is rewound onto cones, ensuring stability and readiness for dyeing.
projectsss.date: Yarn Inspection and Rewinding onto Cones
projectsss.about: Raw yarn undergoes strict quality control: irregularities, knots, and fiber breaking load are checked. Then it goes to winding machines, where it is carefully rewound onto plastic cones — this preparatory stage ensures even dyeing and high quality of the finished product.
projectsss.results: Rewinding achieves stable thread tension, an ideal base for dyeing, and reliability in further production.

services.description: Checking yarn for defects and compliance with strength standards.

services.title: Rewinding onto Cones
services.description: Forming convenient bobbins for stable dyeing process.

services.title: Uniform Tension
services.description: Ensuring proper structure and density of the thread.

services.title: Preparation for Dyeing
services.description: Creating an ideal base for further technological stages.
